languages.text: Империум не забудет о вашем подвиге. Вас обещают приставить к награде сразу же, как откроется проход из Простора Коронус.

traits.locale_text: Империум не забудет о вашем подвиге. Вас обещают приставить к награде сразу же, как откроется проход из Коронуса.

languages.text: The Imperium will not forget your noble act. They promise to award you a commendation as soon as passage from the Koronus Expanse becomes available.
languages.original_text: Империум не забудет о вашем подвиге. Вас обещают приставить к награде сразу же, как откроется проход из Простора Коронус.

traits.locale_text: The Imperium will not forget your noble act. They promise to award you a commendation as soon as the passage from the Koronus Expanse becomes available.
The Imperium will not forget your noble act. They promise to award you a commendation as soon as the passage from the Koronus Expanse becomes available.
The Imperium will not forget your noble act. They promise to award you a commendation as soon as passage from the Koronus Expanse becomes available.
The Imperium will not forget your noble act. They promise to award you a commendation as soon as passage from the Koronus Expanse becomes available.
The Imperium will not forget your noble act. They promise to award you a commendation as soon as passage from the Koronus Expanse becomes available.

languages.text: 帝国不会忘记你高尚之举。他们保证，一旦科罗努斯扩区的通道重新开放，帝国就会赐予你嘉奖。
languages.original_text: The Imperium will not forget your noble act. They promise to award you a commendation as soon as passage from the Koronus Expanse becomes available.

traits.locale_text: 帝国不会忘记你高尚之举。他们保证，一旦科罗努斯扩区的通道重新开放，帝国就会赐予你嘉奖。

languages.text: 帝国はあなたの崇高な行為を忘れないだろう。彼らはコロヌス・エクスパンスからの航路が利用可能になり次第、すぐに表彰すると約束する。
languages.original_text: The Imperium will not forget your noble act. They promise to award you a commendation as soon as passage from the Koronus Expanse becomes available.

traits.locale_text: 帝国はあなたの崇高な行為を忘れないだろう。彼らはコロヌス・エクスパンスからの航路が利用可能になり次第、すぐに表彰すると約束する。

languages.text: El Imperium no olvidará tu noble acto. Prometen concederte una condecoración tan pronto como esté disponible el pasaje desde la Extensión de Koronus.
languages.original_text: The Imperium will not forget your noble act. They promise to award you a commendation as soon as passage from the Koronus Expanse becomes available.

traits.locale_text: El Imperium no olvidará tu noble acto. Prometen concederte una condecoración tan pronto como esté disponible el pasaje desde la Extensión de Koronus.

languages.text: Das Imperium wird deinen Großmut nicht vergessen. Sie versprechen, dich mit einer Belobigung zu ehren, sobald ein Verlassen der Koronus-Ausdehnung möglich ist.
languages.original_text: The Imperium will not forget your noble act. They promise to award you a commendation as soon as passage from the Koronus Expanse becomes available.

traits.locale_text: Das Imperium wird deinen Großmut nicht vergessen. Sie versprechen, dich mit einer Belobigung zu ehren, sobald ein Verlassen der Koronus-Ausdehnung möglich ist.

languages.text: L'Imperium n'oubliera pas votre noble geste. Vos interlocuteurs s'engagent à vous remettre une décoration dès que la voie des Étendues de Koronus sera libre.
languages.original_text: The Imperium will not forget your noble act. They promise to award you a commendation as soon as passage from the Koronus Expanse becomes available.

traits.locale_text: L'Imperium n'oubliera pas votre noble geste. Vos interlocuteurs s'engagent à vous remettre une décoration dès que la voie des Étendues de Koronus sera libre.

languages.text: İmparatorluk, bu soylu eylemini unutmayacak. Koronus Enginliği'nden geçmek mümkün olduğunda sana bir takdirname takdim etmeye söz veriyorlar.
languages.original_text: The Imperium will not forget your noble act. They promise to award you a commendation as soon as passage from the Koronus Expanse becomes available.
